website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for smaller jobs, but it isn't practical for tough tasks or industrial use.
pros: Cord-free JumpStart technology is easy to use
Padded hip belt for even weight distribution
cons: Its 150 mph airflow and 32 cc engine offer less power than competitors

customer_reviews.title: Better off buying locally
customer_reviews.text: We received our new leaf blower yesterday. Requested a return today. It will not stay running. Called tech support and they were not helpful. Told us to return it to place of purchase. Sounded like he did not want to be bothered. Will buy a different brand now.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing... Locked up just after 2 year warranty expired!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Not much... Cons: Poor Power Very Poor Quality (back straps tore in a few uses..) Hard to start (always needed starter spray to get going) Death... locked up after on 2 years and about 40 sessions of use. (I always maintained it as directed)
customer_reviews.author: clayton

customer_reviews.title: 4 cycle troy built leave blower
customer_reviews.text: used it twice since I received it as a gift once for 1 inch of snow and once to blow out my 4 bay garage I have read the reviews on this and so far have had no trouble at all my generator sits along side my house and the gap between the storage box the genny is in leaves gather and used this to blow out the leaves. will do another review after spring clean up
customer_reviews.author: no

customer_reviews.title: Great blower
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a hand held 4 Cycle blower. I have a lot of area to cover and I would have to take breaks to rest my arms, wrists and shoulders. Any backpack is a little challenging to get into for a person my age, but I have worked out a system that makes it pretty easy. Best of all, I can use a whole tank of gas before I have to take a break. I also love the electric starter option. I am converting all of my gas powered yard tools to Troy-Bilt.
customer_reviews.author: Tom C

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this blower!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this in September 2016 used 3 times gas is leaking all over the place . Looked for certificate dealer in my area know one fixes this blower . Now I am stuck with piece of junk blower with warranty that's no good .
customer_reviews.author: gladys bullock

customer_reviews.title: Dropped two stars
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy with it until the engine blew after less than three years home use only twice a month until each fall when it was used weekly for about a month. Changed the oil each fall with no issue and tried using last week after checking fuel and oil status and bang the engine seized. Checked with Troy Built and was told no warranty after two years. I always figured this company made quality parts but seems they have decided to manufactured poor quality to make more $. I own a Troy built lawn mower for six+ years and a snow blower seven+ years with no issues. Quite disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: No mixing of gas and oil!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the 4 cycle feature so I don't have to mix the gas and oil. It is light weight and starts on the first pull every time. If I had a lot of heavy leaf blowing I probably would have purchased the larger model. For grass clippings and light(dry) leaf blowing it is wonderful. I don't believe it gets the wind speed that a 2 cycle seems to get due to lower rpm's, but it does all that I ask of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to start and works great!
customer_reviews.text: This replaced my Husqvarna backpack blower (which was around 10 years old) and it works just as expected. Easy to start, easy to lift and put on my back, and performs great. Also love not having to mix fuel and oil anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Yarnall

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Was a Great product. Not the strongest blower I've owned. But For the price it was good. BUT NOT AFTER WARRANTY ! Revised July 7 2016. Leaks gas all over, out of the engine itself! All over my back. DANGEROUS !!!!
customer_reviews.author: JerseyBooch

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged (I had ordered previously from another supplier and it arrived broken because it was poorly packaged). Easy to start, easy to use, and not heavy. Love the 4-stroke engine, no oil mixing
customer_reviews.author: D. Gutekunst

customer_reviews.title: Love my Back Pack Leaf Blower, It Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love my backpack leaf blower! It is easy to start, as comfortable to wear as a backpack leaf blower could be, and works fantastic! Cut the time for yard clean up from several hours to one. So much easier than raking for hours! It is a bit clumsy to put on, but its getting easier each time I use it. I don't think you could avoid that with this type of equipment. I highly recommend the Troy-Bilt Back Pack Leaf Blower. P.S., I am medium size female. Not many muscles!
customer_reviews.author: Christine E. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Gas 4 cycle backpack blower
customer_reviews.text: This very easy to set up and began using within minutes. Oil included just add gas. Started very easy and does a very good job of blowing leaves.
customer_reviews.author: ronald

customer_reviews.title: Ran for ten minutes then stopped and pull cord jammed ...
customer_reviews.text: Ran for ten minutes then stopped and pull cord jammed second troy bilt I have purchased and both failed!!!! Buy Echo - Same price and 10 times the quality
customer_reviews.author: Cole Bauer

customer_reviews.title: dont buy
customer_reviews.text: unit lasted all of 45 minutes , engine seized . Spent 4 hours in car commuting back and forth to authorized repair place only to be told it was not worth repairing . next spent hours on hold with troy-bilt and finally got authorized to return to place of purchase witch was 2 hours driving time . Amazon will not take back product that had gasoline or oil in them.
customer_reviews.author: Marie S.

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: If you buy this blower be prepared to replace it yearly. I only bought it (and continue to) because of the jump starter. If you get second season out of it, consider yourself lucky. Forget about getting warranty service. No-one wants to work on these. Company totally unhelpful. .....but I'll continue to buy it until someone else makes one with Jump starter!
customer_reviews.author: lee swerdloff

customer_reviews.title: Good homeowner’s blower
customer_reviews.text: I like the assisted starting with the attachment. High air volume and very good wind speed.
customer_reviews.author: Teach2665

customer_reviews.title: After opening the box and putting it together I t ...
customer_reviews.text: After opening the box and putting it together I t would no start, called mfg. and they said to do what the instruction said to do.. after two days of trying to start it, sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Vellioh

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We had a Troy built backpack blower for six years. It was so great that we decided to buy another one. This one is even easier to start and just as simple to use. We couldn’t be happier with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Skender

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I take pride in knowing how to work and maintain engines. This runs like a champ. Starts on the second pull every time. I use it to clean the yard, garage and was a big help when we put a new roof on the house this spring. I would buy this again, no worries!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Ampe

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Used 3 times now won't run. Carb problems. Troy Built name used to mean something.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk E. Buikema

customer_reviews.title: More poor quality that costsyou later
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. 3rd season an pull start assembly broken. Repair not worth time And parts. Buy another brand that builds quality in....STIHL or ECO
customer_reviews.author: Tom Bartley

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Saved me from raking a boat load of leaves on numerous occasions great value
customer_reviews.author: Matthew camp

customer_reviews.title: "Troy Bilt" Back Pack Blower
customer_reviews.text: Received the blower timely and assembly was fairly easy.It started easily and I have used it 4-5 times already.I appreciate the quieter four stroke engine and am very pleased with it's performance.It's not an industrial strength blower but for our property which has numerous Oak and large White Pines (which drop as many needles as the Oaks) this unit is more than adequate.We are hoping for ease of maintenance and longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Silverspace

customer_reviews.title: Gret product
customer_reviews.text: Great prodcut for an attractive price. This Backpack Blower with JumpStart Technology works very well and with the JumpStart, it is very easy to start - no more pulling that cord to get the engine started!
customer_reviews.author: Marty T

customer_reviews.title: Good power, not too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Good power, not too heavy. Hard to get all the straps adjusted but once you are locked in properly it is fine. Reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: whisper

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Just wish the tube were longer and more flexible to allow for it to be held more parallel with the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Prof. G.

customer_reviews.title: Great blower!
customer_reviews.text: Love this blower! Love the idea of not having to mix oil and gas. Not as powerful as the big blowers, but does the job just fine. Very reliable!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Morgan

customer_reviews.title: should have bought one sooner
customer_reviews.text: Great blower - probably not for full on commercial use but, I have 2 acres with over 20 large trees and it works great for that. Huge improvement over a hand held. The 4 stroke saves all the oil mixing and starts easy/runs great/comfortable pack. Though it's not terribly loud you would definately want hearing protection. Fast shipping and OEM packaging. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: bmountains

customer_reviews.title: Broke down after using approx 5 times
customer_reviews.text: We received this Leaf blower the end of May and have used approximately five times. My husband used it last week, October 7th and it quit working. Had a service person look at it and he could not fix.
customer_reviews.author: Candle girl

customer_reviews.title: Good quality blower
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blower for my son because I actually have the same exact one and love it! Its great for a big yard with lots of leaves. It will actually blow small branches as well. I like the backpack option and the fact it uses straight gas. No mixing involved! So far my son loves his blower.
customer_reviews.author: GenziT

customer_reviews.title: BEST BLOWER I HAVE EVER HAD
customer_reviews.text: BEST BLOWER I HAVE EVER HAD, ITS BEEN WITH ME QUITE AWHILE AND I WOULD GET ANOTHER IF I NEEDED IT . GREAT TROY-BILT EQUIPMENT, THANK YOU VERY MUCH, WOULD RECOMMEND TO OTHERS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Firestarter48

customer_reviews.title: Good choice of a blower
customer_reviews.text: No mixing is great, relitivly lightweight, and quiet too. East pull start, wish the pull was closer to the front though.
customer_reviews.author: Daina C.

customer_reviews.title: Leaf blower
customer_reviews.text: This blower starts and runs great. I like it because it’s four cycle engine doesn’t require gas and oil mix.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R. Diblin

customer_reviews.title: Nice 4 stroke
customer_reviews.text: Nice back pack blower. Wise it had a little more air speed. Works great with the little easy starter that you pay the extra money for.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Love this blower
customer_reviews.text: Great blower for home use. Put some gas with stabilizer runs great. The strap suspension system is amazing you almost forget you are wearing an engine.
customer_reviews.author: RDR

customer_reviews.title: Nice blower
customer_reviews.text: Very nice 4 stroke blower. Starts great, fired right up first pull out of the box. Assembly was easy. I did slow the idle down a little bit (personal preference, not necessary). Very comfortable, and a good price. I would recommend it 9/2014 Update: Not reliable, after 5 years of light use totaling maybe 100 hrs, engine started making bad noises. Tore it down to find a shattered piston skirt. Called the customer support number (Troy bilt is owned by MTD) and they told me they do not sell internal engine components, but they would be happy to sell me a new engine (which is on back order... wonder why?!) No thanks. Engine has "made in china" stamped on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent yard equipment for the price
customer_reviews.text: Started easily. Comfortable to wear. Very powerful and effective for the price
customer_reviews.author: B Strat

customer_reviews.title: Quick start and go....
customer_reviews.text: Initial review: Love it! 5 minutes of assembly, then pour in the oil and gas and go blow things away! Started right away and ran like a champ for the hour I used it and it was at full throttle almost the whole time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: It’s like a disposable
customer_reviews.text: 2nd one I bought and motor blew again. Plenty of oil in it. It’s like a disposable blower
customer_reviews.author: edgelawn16

customer_reviews.title: Love the personal customer service
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem with the first one I purchased, and Troy-Bilt immediately sent out another. Love the personal customer service. Still working perfectly. Like the fact that no oil mix is necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonia Baltimora

customer_reviews.title: Good for non-commercial use
customer_reviews.text: Good for non-commercial use, had to have a replacement unit sent. Original unit had poor balance on air impeller. Previous reviews warned of this....not unexpected......
customer_reviews.author: K. M. A

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: first year it worked fine, than it just started making engine problems & starter malfunctioned.
customer_reviews.author: st

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great deal.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as my first "used Amazon direct product". Came in the original box, with no issues. Works great and so far have not had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mine pours gas all over my back!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this product once. it poured gas all over my back and I see in the reviews that at least one other person has had this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Ar

customer_reviews.title: really great blower, easy starting
customer_reviews.text: really great blower, easy starting, lots of power and best of all the weight and not adding oil to gas.
customer_reviews.author: Toolman1

customer_reviews.title: wife bought this and i love it.
customer_reviews.text: wife bought this and i love it.... there was another for a little more but this ones last the summer without any problem
customer_reviews.author: tmelsonjr

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be a really nice blower for the price. The fact that it has a 4 cycle engine is a major plus in my book. I recommend buying the drill starter piece too. No more pulling the starter cord for me!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: ran 10 minutes then stopped! for all those are sitting there wondering if i put the oil in, yes i did!
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for one season. It is still under warranty ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked for one season. It is still under warranty so my husband brought it for servicing. The technician (Troy Bilt authorized) said these machines are junk. They are subject to problems with gas (ethanol problems) and to replace gas line is expensive. It has a two year warranty and the Amazon receipt is all that's required. But this does not deserve even one star. Very expensive mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Last Minute One

customer_reviews.title: Broken after three uses, still waiting for refund or replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Broke after three uses. Still waiting for refund or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Dauphin

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: Not having to mix oil with the gas makes it easier to operate. It has adequate air flow(150 MPH)to do the job with the 32cc engine and it costs about $175 less than the heavier more powerful other brand model with 180 MPH air flow and 55cc 2 cycle engine that I had in the past. The air tube comes in twist together sections that potentially could leak air. It starts easily and runs well. I recommend this blower.
customer_reviews.author: MLB

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for what I do
customer_reviews.text: Good enough for what I do, but if you have a big yard or lots of leaves then I would recommend a 2 stroke.
customer_reviews.author: Craig McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: good price for a little blower
customer_reviews.text: A good little blower, the key word is LITTLE. Good if you want to blow a few leaves off the deck, or maybe a 20 ft driveway, but then a broom would be would be faster and easier. It starts and runs fine, light weight easy to handle. If you have a long driveway or a large lawn, it's just too wimpy. Once you get a pile of leaves of any size you'll need a rake. If you're going to get a leaf blower, get a bigger one. It just doesn't have the umpf to do much.
customer_reviews.author: Gustav Pedersen

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. No problems. Way more powerful that my electric, and much easier to use around the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Traver

customer_reviews.title: Blow freely
customer_reviews.text: VERY EASY to put together and started right up the first time,very simple to use.Thank you to strange man in Loews that told me to go this way and save money on a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Harry White jr

customer_reviews.title: I thought  it would be better than what it is.
customer_reviews.text: My old electric blower had more blowing power. The out put of air is not like it should be.like the motor needs to speed up some more to get more air out put.
customer_reviews.author: Pat bollman

customer_reviews.title: Best blower I ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: Best blower I ever owned! and I have had a lot of them.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Just enough
customer_reviews.text: not as powerful as I thought it would be. Real test this fall blowing leaves
customer_reviews.author: POPPDADDY

customer_reviews.title: Troy Built TB4BP blower
customer_reviews.text: The unit was scheduled to ship. The Amazon vender had a problem and the shipping date was pushed out. Communications with the vender was difficult. The blower arrived in good condition and is operating properly
customer_reviews.author: Jim Rau

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad but could be better
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! The only complaint i have is that it should have just a little bit more power/blow to it. There is a governor on it and it keeps it from really "blowing away the competition".
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and start. Love the jump start ability
customer_reviews.text: Easy to get started , powerful velocity and comfortable to work with.
customer_reviews.author: CYNTHIA

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy. My lawn was never so leaf free. Easy to start and easy to use. I don't know how I survived without it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light and quite
customer_reviews.text: This blower replaced my old 2 cycle blower. It is much lighter and well padded but the blowing power is just a bit less than my old blower. But it gets the job done just take a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Tulsa666

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: WENT FROM THE HAND HELD MODEL TO THIS BACK PAK MODEL VERY PLEASED EASY TO START WEIGHT DISTRIBUTION IS AWESOME AND DOESNT FEEL HEAVY ON YOUR BACK
customer_reviews.author: SLAYR

customer_reviews.title: POWER!  POWER!  POWER!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this unit after days of searching reviews online. Very powerful unit. Makes clean up a breeze. Easy to set up, and easier to start. This unit could be started by a child...easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My husband uses this blower constantly. He loves the ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this blower constantly. He loves the convenience of having his hands free because this blower fits on his back.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Equipment stopped working one year after purchasing it. Kept stalling out after 30 seconds of running it. Took it to Repair Service Center 2 times and they couldn't fix it. That was another bad experience as well. Ending up having to buy another one, different brand, different place.
customer_reviews.author: Cal Tinsley

customer_reviews.title: Started up right away with out a lot of effort.
customer_reviews.text: So far it is great I use to use the 2cycle blowers, I have gone through 3 of those within the lase 15 years. The four cyle seems to be easier to start and very powerful.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: My husband is very impressed with the ease & power ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very impressed with the ease & power of this blower so far, just hope it lasts for many years
customer_reviews.author: Pat Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Not hot on your back
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job at a good prioce. Quiet 4 stroke engine. Plenty of power for me. Not hot on your back like other blowers.
customer_reviews.author: Boilerplate

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: this blower worked for few days then it started leaking gas out..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It worked only one day, When you review the ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked only one day, When you review the starting engine directions, it is obvious that this is a very touchy 4 cycle engine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice not having to mix the
customer_reviews.text: Needs more power, nice not having to mix the oil
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Semi-Decent Blower
customer_reviews.text: I would not reccomend this blower to anyone. Yes, it blows, and it starts easy so I give it a three star rating. But, it doesnt blow very hard. It takes me a while to move a pile of leaves while I watch my neighbor with his Husquarvana just blow his all over the place. I live in the North East, so Fall out here is a bear. If you live in california or something, this thing would probably be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 10 minutes and died. Couldn't get it to restart. Now being repaired.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this back pack blower
customer_reviews.text: The blower is everything I wanted and more. Easy to use and performs very well
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful, and easy starting.
customer_reviews.text: Easy starting with plenty of blow power. Lightweight, you can use it for hours. Good for getting the deep matting off the lawn. The wand is only on your right side, so plan your movements ahead. And the backpack limits access behind shrubs, etc. I'm only using ethanol-free gas. Wear ear muffs. The "cruise control" throttle lets you set the speed without having to have your finger on the trigger all the time. I just run it full throttle. Tank of gas goes about an hour. Stands up on the ground for easy filling and storage.
customer_reviews.author: C W Morse

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra money, well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I always viewed blowers as disposable products that would last several years and would purchase the $80 models. After several years it was cheaper to buy an new one vs taking it for service. I finally decided, no more mixing fuel. Starts right up which my Ryobi never did even when brand new. Powerful air stream, very comfortable to wear, no more sucking your pants into the air intake. Much quieter than other blowers that I have owned. My only hope is that this one will last for 4 - 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Pennsylvania

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: So far I have only used this item twice but it cranks easily and works great. Well balanced, easy to handle. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ArkieVol

customer_reviews.title: Does What It Is Supposed To Do
customer_reviews.text: Having a 4 cycle blower is much more convenient than the 2 cycle model. This blower starts easily, has an adequate blowing force, is lightweight and is not overly noisy. My needs are fairly modest and consist mainly of blowing leaves off my driveway, sidewalk and patio. This does the job to my satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Duffer.Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: The last blower you will buy!
customer_reviews.text: Gas powered is the best, no mixing, starts 1st time , every time!
customer_reviews.author: baddbare

customer_reviews.title: defective hose
customer_reviews.text: The plastic hose had to be taped together to keep the hose from falling off all the time other than that it works fine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased but.......
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this purchase. The blower started on the first pull. Have used it several times since owning and it always starts on the first pull. The power is sufficient to do what I wanted. Only complaint is that the 4 cycle oil seems to leak from somewhere and I can't identify the source. When I am done using, I set it on the garage floor and always get an oil spot on the floor sometimes minimal and sometimes larger spotting. Overall, good product.
customer_reviews.author: Don G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great....right out of the box....Just like Troy-Bilt is suppose too...
customer_reviews.author: Robert. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: After the 4th carburetor I am going to give up on this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised--no bad surprises. Started on the second pull once I had oil and gas in it. It cut the work time in half when compared to the effort required a corded blower.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Lungs can blow better air
customer_reviews.text: No power for blowing yard debri. Now I have a product that doesn't work, almost $200 loss plus extended 2 year warranty paid for.
customer_reviews.author: sct

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not enough blowing power as it was described in the description
customer_reviews.author: sean travis

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: just purchased this in march used it maybe 5 times and it died completey !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work very well. Much quieter than other models
customer_reviews.author: Darlys Yoder

customer_reviews.title: Great price for your money
customer_reviews.text: The use and ease of this Troy-Bilt blower is very user friendly. Just as the directions states, 7-10 pumps to prime the gas globe and it starts. I only wish I would have gotten a more powerful one than 150 MPH, but it is a great product.4 cylcle is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: ll112962

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it... Go with a Better model
customer_reviews.text: I've had this blower for 2 yrs now and the pull cord has broke three times now. First time was under warranty, but Troy Bilt servicer stated it was normal wear and tear. At $50 a pop to replace it, I've already spent in the $ 400's for this machine. Also, it doesn't have the blowing power I expected with a 150mph machine. I'm going to buy something else and see if I can recover my losses by selling this one. CRUMMY product.
customer_reviews.author: TJC

customer_reviews.title: Clear Autumn leaves
customer_reviews.text: Starts easily. Works well. 4-cycle means no need to mix oil and gas. Amazon had the best price. Enough said.
customer_reviews.author: Jim G

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I own two them It is the best back pack blower I have ever own. I have clean yard's that the leave's were a foot deep. All of the other I have try are so heavy by the end of the day you will wish you had never seen one them $400.oo and $600.00 machine's you are just buying the name. I have tried them all .
customer_reviews.author: Rouabout

customer_reviews.title: Troy-Built back pack Blower
customer_reviews.text: A good quality product at a good price, lightweight, easy pull start, all adjustable to my working comfort, works great around my residence. Thank You Amazon
customer_reviews.author: sportsman

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use and powerfull.
customer_reviews.text: Good power, easy assembly and use. Lightweight adjustable straps dispurse weight evenly, 4 stroke engine requires no fuel mixing. Tank of gas clears large property easily.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Works great we love it . Was real easy to run and work .. With the gas only feature it makes life easy
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Loprete

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BLOWER!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The oil not with the gas makes this a winner. Does a geat job blowing. GO SAINTS!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: wst553

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Good Blower - a little weak the first time but after that its power is strong. Starts right up and does a very nice job of blowing the leafs no matter wet or dry and fits on the back with no weight issues.
customer_reviews.author: bart lerud

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a year then died
customer_reviews.text: Machine works great, however after a year it started to smoke and died. Unable to re-start. Oil level etc was checked ok etc. Guess I have to find a fix or a replacement, you get what you pay for. :(
customer_reviews.author: H.W. W

product_meta.title: Troy-Bilt TB4BP EC 32cc 4-Cycle Backpack Blower with JumpStart Technology
product_meta.description:
Big jobs require the best tools and the Troy-Bilt 4-Cycle TB4BP EC is a powerful backpack blower that can move big piles of leaves easily and is in a comfortable ergonomic compact backpack design to reduce user fatigue. The 32cc 4-cycle full crank engine is a high-torque design that is capable of outputting up to 500 cfm and 150 mph. With a powerful airflow generated by a powerful 4-cycle Troy-Bilt engine, this gas leaf blower has more torque without the hassle of gas and oil mixing. The engine also has both SpringAssist technology and JumpStart capability for easy starting. The patented Coolflex backpack harness design has padded straps and allows cool air to circulate to the operator's back. Backed by a 2-year limited warranty, the Troy-Bilt TB4BP EC allows you the comfort to keep working until the job is done.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Troy-Bilt 32cc gas backpack blower with the new padded harness technology makes is easier and more comfortable to get rid of leaves. This blower has a compression release starting system and a fully tensioned multi-material suspension system. The backpack blower can generate up 150 MPH and 480 CFM. This blower has a 4-cycle gas engine which means no oil and gas mix is needed. This model comes with a 2-year manufactures warranty.
feature_bullets: Operating from the user's backpack, this gas blower is comfortable, yet powerful enough to handle your landscaping needs
Up to 150 mph air speed and 500 cfm air volume for blowing large piles of leaves and debris
Fully-tensioned multi-material suspension system distributes weight evenly and comfortably between shoulders and hips
Backpack design and padded hip belt for reduced operator fatigue; fits the shape of your hips and reduces pressure points
Long flex tube allows operator to maneuver around and under objects
